summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 44th Avenue Southwest from West Austin Street to a point 50 feet more or less, south of West Portland Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 12323 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
